response.overview: “Help” is a surreal animated short by Jack Stauber, blending his signature 3D clay-like visuals with unsettling sound design and abstract storytelling. In just under a minute, it explores themes of helplessness, confusion, and human emotion through distorted movement and eerie atmosphere. As with much of Stauber’s work, it walks the line between the whimsical and the disturbing.
response.title: Help
